name: Sink or Skim
description: A top down platformer about a rock skimming across the water from island to island. Bounce from wall to wall to keep up speed, go too slow and you sink below the waves.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Not great but decent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Any Direct X compatible sound card
